Package entities

Class Boss

java.lang.Object
entities.Entity
entities.Boss
public abstract class Boss extends Entity
This will be an abstract class that provides a framework for all bosses in the game. This class allows the bosses to have similar behaviors, both in code and possibly in gameplay. It allows the EnemyManager to work well with this and Enemy.
Author:
Sean-Paul Brown

  • Constructor Details

    • Boss

      public Boss(float x, float y, int width, int height, int boss_type)
      This is the constructor for a Boss Entity
      Parameters:
      x - the horizontal coordinate, on the left side of the hitbox
      y - the vertical coordinate, on the top of the hitbox
      width - the width of the hitbox
      height - the height of the hitbox
      boss_type - the type of boss that it will be

      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics where to draw the Boss
